main_definition: occurring or done once every week, relating to a period of seven days

meanings_and_examples.example: She attends the yoga class on a weekly basis.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A publication released once a week
meanings_and_examples.example: The 'Weekly News' is a popular local newspaper that comes out every Thursday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An event or meeting scheduled to occur regularly on a weekly basis
meanings_and_examples.example: Our team has a weekly project update meeting every Wednesday afternoon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A payment schedule that is made once per week
meanings_and_examples.example: He pays his rent in installments, with the first day being a weekly deadline.
